Description: Low conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style patterned, pottery chalice; white slip; exterior: glazed streaky black with reserved band around edge of foot; reserved on underside with inscription.
Curator's comments: The number in Petrie's catalogue, '66', is written in pen on the underside of the foot.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 66)
Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 170, no. 33)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1091) (phase 2)
